page.title: 07 EMPLOYMENT IN OUR AREA
page.content:
AGRICULTURE USED TO EMPLOY MOST OF THE PEOPLE IN OUR AREA .SINCE{WORLD {WAR 11}FARMS HAVE BECOME MORE EFFCIENT AND MACHINERY HAS REPLACED OLD METHODS . THE{DEVELOPMENT BOARD FOR RURAL {WALES}WAS SET UP TO STOP PEOPLE FROM LEAVING THE AREA.THEY BUILT FACTORIES AND NEW FIRMS HAVE BEEN ESTABLISHED. THE NEAREST TOWN NEWTOWN, HAS LOTS OF FACTORIES AND EMPLOYS MANY PEOPLE .LAURA ASHELY'S FACTORY IN CARNO IS LARGE AND IS STILL EXPANDING.BRITISH RAIL AND LLYS MALDWYN HOSPITAL ARE BOTH LARGE EMPLOYERS.THE OLD SCHOOL IS NOW BEING TURNED INTO SMALL WORK SHOPS. UNEMPLOYMENT IS NOT VERY HIGH IN OUR AREA.
**** JONATHAN ****
